DOC.brief_summary: BACKGROUND : Mesh nebulizer ( MN ) low residual volume increase inhaled dose compare jet nebulizer ( JN ) per vitro animal model . The aim study compare radioaerosol deposition use MN JN healthy subject , use 2-D planar scintigraphy . METHODS : A randomized trial 6 normal subject ( 4 female , 2 male ) inhale 99mTc-DTPA activity 1 mCi normal saline total dose 4 mL JN ( Misty Max , Air Life , Yorba Linda , USA ) oxygen flow 8 L / min 1.5 mL MN ( Aeroneb Solo Ultra adapter ; Aerogen Galway , Ireland ) . Scintigraphy use determine distribution deposition mass balance compartment .
DOC.criteria: The study inclusion critera healthy adult sex , 18 65 year , without history lung disease smoking , force vital capacity ( FVC ) force expiratory volume first second ( FEV1 ) great equal 80 % predict value ( Pereira et al. , 1992 ) , ability follow retain verbal command able willing provide sign consent participate study . Participants exclude diagnosed lung disease , current smoker , unable understand follow procedure pregnant unable tolerate nebulization .
